channel.title: Amazon Web Services (AWS) on OpsWise
channel.description: Recent content in Amazon Web Services (AWS) on OpsWise

item.title: Setting Up AWS ECR service
item.description: Create ECR Repository with vulnerability scanning aws ecr create-repository --repository-name <MY_ECR_REPO_NAME> \ --image-scanning-configuration scanOnPush=true --region us-east-2

item.title: Best practices for advanced serverless developers
item.description: re:invent 2022 recorded session This session provides architectural best practices, optimizations, and useful cheat codes that you can use to build secure, high-scale, and high-performance serverless applications and uses real customer scenarios to illustrate the benefits.
